40 class EdgeInf;

47 typedef unsigned int ConnDirFlags;
48 typedef unsigned short VertIDProps;

50 
51 class VertID
52 {
53  public:
54  unsigned int objID;
55  unsigned short vn;
56  // Properties:
57  VertIDProps props;
58 
59  static const unsigned short src;
60  static const unsigned short tar;
61 
62  static const VertIDProps PROP_ConnPoint;
63  static const VertIDProps PROP_OrthShapeEdge;
64  static const VertIDProps PROP_ConnectionPin;
65  static const VertIDProps PROP_ConnCheckpoint;
66  static const VertIDProps PROP_DummyPinHelper;
67 
68  VertID();
69  VertID(unsigned int id, unsigned short n, VertIDProps p = 0);
70  VertID(const VertID& other);
71  VertID& operator= (const VertID& rhs);
72  bool operator==(const VertID& rhs) const;
73  bool operator!=(const VertID& rhs) const;
74  bool operator<(const VertID& rhs) const;
75  VertID operator+(const int& rhs) const;
76  VertID operator-(const int& rhs) const;
77  VertID& operator++(int);
78  void print(FILE *file = stdout) const;
79  void db_print(void) const;
80  friend std::ostream& operator<<(std::ostream& os, const VertID& vID);
81 
82  // Property tests:
83  inline bool isOrthShapeEdge(void) const
84  {
85  return (props & PROP_OrthShapeEdge) ? true : false;
86  }
87  inline bool isConnPt(void) const
88  {
89  return (props & PROP_ConnPoint) ? true : false;
90  }
91  inline bool isConnectionPin(void) const
92  {
93  return (props & PROP_ConnectionPin) ? true : false;
94  }
95  inline bool isConnCheckpoint(void) const
96  {
97  return (props & PROP_ConnCheckpoint) ? true : false;
98  }
99  inline bool isDummyPinHelper(void) const
100  {
101  return (props & PROP_DummyPinHelper) ? true : false;
102  }
103 };
104 
105 
106 // An ID given to all dummy vertices inserted to allow creation of the
107 // orthogonal visibility graph since the vertices in the orthogonal graph
108 // mostly do not correspond to shape corners or connector endpoints.
109 //
110 static const VertID dummyOrthogID(0, 0);
111 static const VertID dummyOrthogShapeID(0, 0, VertID::PROP_OrthShapeEdge);

114 class VertInf
115 {
116  public:
117  VertInf(Router *router, const VertID& vid, const Point& vpoint,
118  const bool addToRouter = true);
119  ~VertInf();
120  void Reset(const VertID& vid, const Point& vpoint);
121  void Reset(const Point& vpoint);
122  void removeFromGraph(const bool isConnVert = true);
123  bool orphaned(void);
124 
125  unsigned int pathLeadsBackTo(const VertInf *start) const;
126  void setVisibleDirections(const ConnDirFlags directions);
127  ConnDirFlags directionFrom(const VertInf *other) const;
128  // Checks if this vertex has the target as a visibility neighbour.
129  EdgeInf *hasNeighbour(VertInf *target, bool orthogonal) const;
130  void orphan(void);
131 
132  VertInf **makeTreeRootPointer(VertInf *root);
133  VertInf *treeRoot(void) const;
134  VertInf **treeRootPointer(void) const;
135  void setTreeRootPointer(VertInf **pointer);
136  void clearTreeRootPointer(void);
137 
138  void setSPTFRoot(VertInf *root);
139  VertInf *sptfRoot(void) const;
140 
141  Router *_router;
142  VertID id;
143  Point point;
144  VertInf *lstPrev;
145  VertInf *lstNext;
146  VertInf *shPrev;
147  VertInf *shNext;
148  EdgeInfList visList;
149  unsigned int visListSize;
150  EdgeInfList orthogVisList;
151  unsigned int orthogVisListSize;
152  EdgeInfList invisList;
153  unsigned int invisListSize;
154  VertInf *pathNext;
155 
156  // The tree root and distance value used when computing MTSTs.
157  // XXX: Maybe these should be allocated as a separate struct
158  // and referenced via a pointer. This would be slower due
159  // to memory allocation, but would save 2 x 8 = 24 bytes per
160  // VertInf on 64-bit machines.
161  VertInf *m_orthogonalPartner;
162  VertInf **m_treeRoot;
163  double sptfDist;
164 
165  ConnDirFlags visDirections;
166  std::list<unsigned int> aStarDoneIndexes;
167  // Flags for orthogonal visibility properties, i.e., whether the
168  // line points to a shape edge, connection point or an obstacle.
169  unsigned int orthogVisPropFlags;
170 };

173 // Orthogonal visibility property flags
174 static const unsigned int XL_EDGE = 1;
175 static const unsigned int XL_CONN = 2;

177 static const unsigned int XH_CONN = 8;

184 bool directVis(VertInf *src, VertInf *dst);

187 // A linked list of all the vertices in the router instance. All the
188 // connector endpoints are listed first, then all the shape vertices.
189 // Dummy vertices inserted for orthogonal routing are classed as shape
190 // vertices but have VertID(0, 0).
191 //
192 class VertInfList
193 {
194  public:
195  VertInfList();
196  void addVertex(VertInf *vert);
197  VertInf *removeVertex(VertInf *vert);
198  VertInf *getVertexByID(const VertID& id);
199  VertInf *getVertexByPos(const Point& p);
200  VertInf *shapesBegin(void);
201  VertInf *connsBegin(void);
202  VertInf *end(void);
203  unsigned int connsSize(void) const;
204  unsigned int shapesSize(void) const;
205  private:
206  VertInf *_firstShapeVert;
207  VertInf *_firstConnVert;
208  VertInf *_lastShapeVert;
209  VertInf *_lastConnVert;
210  unsigned int _shapeVertices;
211  unsigned int _connVertices;
212 };

216 typedef std::map<VertID, ShapeSet> ContainsMap;

219 }
